member.name: T:Penguin.DependencyInjection.Abstractions.IRegisterDependencies
member.summary: Denotes that this class should be used by the Penguin DI Engine to register dependencies on initialization

member.name: M:Penguin.DependencyInjection.Abstractions.IRegisterDependencies.RegisterDependencies
member.summary: A method that actually calls the static instance of the Penguin DI engine to register the instances

member.name: T:Penguin.DependencyInjection.Abstractions.IRegisterMostDerived
member.summary: When implemented, the Penguin DI system will return a transient instance of the most derived class that inherits from this one, if the class is not registered when requested This is useful for ensuring that consuming library implementations of a class are always selected over the class that defines this

member.name: T:Penguin.DependencyInjection.Abstractions.ISelfRegistering
member.summary: When implemented, the Penguin DI system will create a transient instance of the object if it is unregistered when it is requested
